          <title>
            <string language="en">Plotting magnetic field lines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Plotten magnetisch fangen Zeilen 
auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traçage des lignes de champ magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Traçando linhas do campo magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tracciato delle righe del campo magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμές μαγνητικών πεδίων χάραξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trazar líneas del campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three diagrams on plotting magnetic field lines. This diagram shows a compass that is used to plot the magnetic field lines of a bar magnet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compass needle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plotting magnetic field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Diagrammen auf dem Plotten 
magnetisch fangen Sie Zeilen auf. Dieses Diagramm 
stellt dar, daß ein Kompaß, der benutzt wird, um das magnetische zu 
plotten, Zeilen eines Stabmagneten auffangen Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois diagrammes sur tracer le champ 
magnétique raye. Ce diagramme montre une boussole qui est 
utilisée pour tracer les lignes de champ magnétique d'une barre 
aimantée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três diagramas em traçar o 
campo magnético alinha. Este diagrama mostra um compasso que 
seja usado traçar as linhas do campo magnético de um ímã de barra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre schemi sul tracciato il 
campo magnetico si allinea. Questo schema mostra una bussola che
è utilizzata per tracciare le righe del campo magnetico di un magnete
di barra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών διαγραμμάτων στη χάραξη των γραμμών 
μαγνητικών πεδίων. Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει μια πυξίδα 
που χρησιμοποιείται για να σχεδιάσει τις γραμμές μαγνητικών 
πεδίων ενός μαγνήτη ράβδων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres diagramas en trazar el campo 
magnético alinea. Este diagrama muestra un compás que se 
utilice para trazar las líneas del campo magnético de un imán de 
barra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">umgehen Sie Nadel</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie Zeilen auf</string>
          </keyword>
